page.title: 16COMMUNITY POLICING
page.content: There are many criminals in our area so we've got lots of police men and women. The problem is many people still don't care and make our area a rough place but we have quite a good police force. Over a month ago some of the police force came and visited us at school and told us all about the police force. Their names were W.P.C.Grant, W.P.C.Mathews and P.C.Evans. They told us that police cars were called panda cars because long ago they where black and white like pandas. They also told us about their working conditions and also the different jobs in the police force. We have policemen and women patrolling different areas just in case there is a robbery or something. Nearly every day I see police men and women patrolling our area.
